name: EBB Essentials Kit
description:
Want to sample all of our bestsellers?  You can with our new EBB Essentials Kit. Each kit has a generous sample size of our most effective natural beauty products.  Within each kit you will find: 
2 oz Shea Butter
4 oz Coconut Skin Polish
4 oz African Black Soap
2 oz Natural Deodorant 
1 vial of our famous skin miracle: Argan Oil

name: All Natural Deodorant
description: The ONLY natural deodorant I have ever used that actually works!!  Guaranteed.  Made of all natural ingredients of shea butter, aluminum free baking soda, coconut oil and lemon essential oil.  You'll never use harmful deodorants again.  Promise.

name: Lemon Facial Scrub
description: An excellent exfoliator perfect for all skin types. Made of all natural ingredients of oat flour, corn meal, lemon peel powder and lemon essential oil.  Will leave your skin smooth and glowing.

name: Coconut Skin Polish
description: Made with organic coconut oil, granulated sugar and a touch of tea tree essence, it's like microdermabrasion in a jar.  Perfect for the whole body and especially effective exfoliator for the face.  Reveals beautiful, glowing skin.  Coconut oil is non-comedogenic.

name: Whipped Raw Shea Butter
description: One of the most naturally emollient butters in the world. Extracted from the nut of the African Shea tree, Shea Butter is super rich in nutrients that nourish the skin.  Treats a wide gamut of skin issues -- from wrinkles and dry skin to all manner of ailments such as psoriasis, heat rashes, eczema among other skin maladies.

name: Lavender Body Oil
description: Lavender Body Oil made from all natural grapeseed oil kissed with a touch of lavender essential oil.  The ultimate in luxury for all over moisturization or perfect as a massage oil.

name: African Black Soap
description: One of the best soaps in the world to cleanse your skin and hair.  It's made in Ghana from plantain ash, cocoa pod ashes, shea butter among other natural ingredients. African Black Soap has been used in Africa for centuries to treat eczema, acne, oily skin, psoriasis, and other skin ailments. Combined with the healing and hydrating properties of shea butter, this healing soap should be used daily to balance and resolve problem skin.

name: 100% Organic Argan Oil
description: Referred to as "liquid gold" this 100% organic argan oil is rich in vitamin E and essential fatty acids and sourced from Argan trees that are endemic to Morocco.  This lightweight oil absorbs easily and is beneficial for all skin types.  Use to treat wrinkles, even around eyes, for hair moisturizing and to even soften cuticles.  It's truly an all in one natural beauty solution.
